entry.title: Hogon-in Light Up・宝厳院ライトアップ

link.title: Hogon-in Light Up・宝厳院ライトアップ

entry.content:
It's the beginning of the autumn leaves-turning lightup season in Kyoto, where many temples, shrines, and other places, offer elaborate night-time lighting.

Last night we went to Hogon-in in Arashiyama, only open for the autumn leaves and spring cherry blossoms.

The signpost refers to the nearby Oi River (aka Katsura River)
